SELECT i.id AS inventoryId, w.name AS warehouseName, it.name AS itemName, c.name AS categoryName, it.specification, it.unit, i.quantity, i.last_updated AS lastUpdated FROM inventory i LEFT JOIN warehouse w ON i.warehouse_id = w.id LEFT JOIN item it ON i.item_id = it.id LEFT JOIN category c ON it.category_id = c.id WHERE 1=1
AND w.name LIKE '%' || #{warehouseName} || '%'
AND it.name LIKE '%' || #{itemName} || '%'
ORDER BY i.last_updated DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

AND it.name LIKE '%' || #{itemName} || '%'
